verses.text_plain: Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
verses.verse_html: 1Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.

verses.text_plain: Hide me from the secret counsel of the wicked; from the insurrection of the workers of iniquity:
verses.verse_html: 2Hide me from the secret counsel of the wicked; from the insurrection of the workers of iniquity:

verses.text_plain: Who whet their tongue like a sword, and bend their bows to shoot their arrows, even bitter words:
verses.verse_html: 3Who whet their tongue like a sword, and bend their bows to shoot their arrows, even bitter words:

verses.text_plain: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.
verses.verse_html: 4That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.

verses.text_plain: They encourage themselves in an evil matter: they commune of laying snares privily; they say, Who shall see them?
verses.verse_html:
5They encourage themselves in an evil matter: they commune of laying snares privily; they say, Who shall see them? ▼
▼ matter: or, speech
 , ▼
▼ of…: Heb. to hide his snares

footnotes.body_text: ▼ of…: Heb. to hide his snares
footnotes.body_html: ▼ of…: Heb. to hide his snares

verses.text_plain: They search out iniquities; they accomplish a diligent search: both the inward thought of every one of them, and the heart, is deep.
verses.verse_html:
6They search out iniquities; they accomplish a diligent search: both the inward thought of every one of them, and the heart, is deep. ▼
▼ they…: or, we are consumed by that which they have throughly searched
 , ▼
▼ a diligent…: Heb. a search searched

footnotes.body_text: ▼ they…: or, we are consumed by that which they have throughly searched
footnotes.body_html: ▼ they…: or, we are consumed by that which they have throughly searched

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a diligent…: Heb. a search searched
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a diligent…: Heb. a search searched

verses.text_plain: But God shall shoot at them with an arrow; suddenly shall they be wounded.
verses.verse_html:
7But God shall shoot at them with an arrow; suddenly shall they be wounded. ▼
▼ shall they…: Heb. their wound shall be

footnotes.body_text: ▼ shall they…: Heb. their wound shall be
footnotes.body_html: ▼ shall they…: Heb. their wound shall be

verses.text_plain: So they shall make their own tongue to fall upon themselves: all that see them shall flee away.
verses.verse_html: 8So they shall make their own tongue to fall upon themselves: all that see them shall flee away.

tokens.text: So they shall make their own tongue

verses.text_plain: And all men shall fear, and shall declare the work of God; for they shall wisely consider of his doing.
verses.verse_html: 9And all men shall fear, and shall declare the work of God; for they shall wisely consider of his doing.

verses.text_plain: The righteous shall be glad in the Lord, and shall trust in him; and all the upright in heart shall glory.
verses.verse_html: 10The righteous shall be glad in the Lord, and shall trust in him; and all the upright in heart shall glory.

tokens.text: in him; and all the upright
